overview: Jake and Kristy Briggs are newlyweds. Being young, they are perhaps a bit unprepared for the full reality of marriage and all that it (and their parents) expect from them. Do they want babies? Their parents certainly want them to. Is married life all that there is? Things certainly aren't helped by Jake's friend Davis, who always seems to turn up just in time to put a spanner in the works.
tagline: Man. Woman. Life. Death. Infinity. Tuna casserole. One movie dares to tell it all.
cast: Kevin Bacon|Elizabeth McGovern|Alec Baldwin|William Windom|Holland Taylor
